title: Island Without Shadows
description:
In Garin's hometown, the small island of Young-do, there exists a legend known to all who live there. 
Every person who leaves Young-do is cursed by the mountain god and will face all kinds of misfortune.
“If… If… you've really cursed me… If you lift it… I’ll do anything!” 
“I’ll grant your wish, but in return…”
“Give yourself to me and become my bride.”
author: Kang
